data.eml:eml: A new species of Moenkhausia Eigenmann (Characiformes: Characidae) from the upper rio Juruena basin, Central Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dagosta, Fernando C. P., Marinho, Manoela M. F., Benine, Ricardo C. (2015): A new species of Moenkhausia Eigenmann (Characiformes: Characidae) from the upper rio Juruena basin, Central Brazil. Zootaxa 4032 (4): 417-425, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4032.4.6
